OOC: Not sure anyone answered that, so I'll do it in any case.

What happen=
ed is that there was a slaver ship with both Maximal and
Predacon claves in=
side. That ship crashed and the slaves claimed their
freedom again. Over ti=
me, the old factions surfaced again and skirmish
fighting took over. There =
never was a really big war, but always
enough to hold grudges. Plus, with t=
he recent Iron Skull attempt to
take over Relay, things could get uglier.
